# u-coreutils

![CI](https://github.com/duyixian1234/u-coreutils/workflows/CI/badge.svg?branch=master)

GNU coreutils implementation with Python 3.8

## Tools

✔ cat

✔ echo

✔ head

✔ mkdir

✔ false

✔ base64

✔ factor

## INSTALL

```shell
pip install -U u_coreutils
```

## USE

```shell
u-cat a.txt
u-echo -e -n 'Hello,World!\n'
u-head -n 5 a.txt
u-mkdir -p -v a/b/c/d
u-false
u-base64 -w 100  a.txt
u-factor 10
```
